fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They say it's where the *terrible*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They say it's where the *terrible* questions of our time will be answered -- the tensions are highest, the faultlines deepest."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Six kilometres southwest -- in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Six kilometres southwest -- in the Valley of Dogs -- junior officer Chad Tillbrook takes aim at a rabid, black dog licking its wounds in the grass.

fields.Title: You: ""If we do not?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "If we do not?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh no, detective -- it's not. One..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh no, detective -- it's not. One of the few measurable effects of the pale is that it is expanding at an unknown rate."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Precisely. One of the few measurab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Precisely. One of the few measurable effects of the pale is that it is expanding at an unknown rate."

fields.Title: You: ""Cover *everything*? That can't be...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cover *everything*? That can't be. Where would we go..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I hope so, I truly do. If I may su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hope so, I truly do. If I may suggest -- hold on to your colleague Kitsuragi. I ran a check on him and he is very competent. In the meanwhile..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Even if we have to do it one basic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Even if we have to do it one basic term at a time." She gives you a slight bow.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Steel yourself, officer," she says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Steel yourself, officer," she says in a reassuring manner. "Your colleague, Lieutenant Kitsuragi -- he is competent. I checked up on him. And you also have me -- I will try to assist you in any way I can."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "All right. You're in. Begin with th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All right. You're in. Begin with the first one -- you'll appear *worldly*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This has been informative, thank y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This has been informative, thank you ma'am. I'm sure my memory-impaired partner has *many* more questions to ask..." He turns to you. "...about even more fundamental aspects of reality..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course not," He shakes his head..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course not," He shakes his head. "You're *already* diligent for getting this far -- and diligent boys remember where they left off."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Indeed. I am always at your servic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Indeed. I am always at your service."

fields.Title: You: ""I hope my inquiry into the nature..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hope my inquiry into the nature of reality will ultimately converge with our murder investigation. They are two halves of the same case."
fields.Alternate1: "My theory is that this inquiry into the nature of reality will ultimately converge with our murder investigation. They are really one and the same."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes!" The lieutenant takes a step..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes!" The lieutenant takes a step closer to you, rubbing his hands together. "There is a *stranger* reason, isn't there?"

fields.Title: You: ""That's all for now." (Conclude for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's all for now." (Conclude for now.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes -- you and I belong to the sup..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- you and I belong to the supraculture. We're common, the herd. The music on the radio, the food in the chain restaurant -- those are all too *popular* for the girl in the old-lady rags."

fields.Title: You: ""Disco.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Disco."

fields.Title: You: ""So I'm basically a lackey of capit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I'm basically a lackey of capital?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods, slowly."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods, slowly.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course," she says, apparently u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course," she says, apparently unsurprised. "Well, I'll be here if you need me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh," the lieutenant hums, reading..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh," the lieutenant hums, reading his notes.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I would not have relinquished sove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would not have relinquished sovereignty to the Coalition. Not here in Martinaise -- and not in the Stella Maris or Delta beachheads either. If not for my own sake..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seditious talk, ma'am." The lieute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seditious talk, ma'am." The lieutenant puts down his notes and gives her a look.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She thinks. "But yes, you'll be fin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She thinks. "But yes, you'll be fine, don't worry."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "What is it, what is it, what is it?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is it, what is it, what is it? You can *feel* it -- something pushing against the other side of a locked door. You *must* find the key!

fields.Title: You: ""Okay... what is the pale *like*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay... what is the pale *like*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Am I really that awkward?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Am I really that awkward?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She pauses to take a long, leisurel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She pauses to take a long, leisurely sip of tea. "Alright, what next?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah, yes. That is what counts, I su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes. That is what counts, I suppose. For my part, I was more of a *New* girl."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Well then. Reality *is* a strange..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well then. Reality *is* a strange place -- getting stranger by the day. Ask away, officer. I'll help however I can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No, detective, we're safe." She po..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, detective, we're safe." She points to the sea. "It begins there, 6,000 kilometres to the north, and even more to the south, east, and west. You are in the middle of the isola."

fields.Title: You: ""*You're* not a civilian passenger?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*You're* not a civilian passenger?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""An intuitive conclusion of that de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An intuitive conclusion of that development is that one day the pale will cover everything -- but this sort of talk is mostly left to extremists."

fields.Title: Endurance: "An acidic smile on her lips. It's g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An acidic smile on her lips. It's getting worse every year.

fields.Title: Volition: "Good idea. Just ask him. He won't m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good idea. Just ask him. He won't make a scene.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "This is one thought you *need* to c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is one thought you *need* to complete. Where are you?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The aim is to gain a deeper underst..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The aim is to gain a deeper understanding.

fields.Title: You: ""What am *I*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What am *I*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Let me ask you something else.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me ask you something else."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You would be excused for not knowi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You would be excused for not knowing about it. Unimportant, they say. Forgotten even -- shelled to smithereens during the Revolution." She shrugs. "It has its charms, just not this time of year."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, we're quite a way off. About....."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, we're quite a way off. About..." She points across the water, where the skyscrapers rise...

fields.Title: You: ""I understand everything. Make it m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I understand everything. Make it more complicated somehow."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course. You're much more *groun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. You're much more *grounded*, a serious detective on a case called *reality*. Speaking of -- is there anything else?"

fields.Title: You: ""The Revachol Citizens Militia?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Revachol Citizens Militia?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""...and if the law officials of our..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...and if the law officials of our nation need help with the basic terms of reality -- well, then I am here to help." She bows.

fields.Title: You: ""I have, uh, somewhere to party. Ri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have, uh, somewhere to party. Right now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""All men are predators, dear. Nothi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All men are predators, dear. Nothing much to be done about *that*. It's all a matter of where you get to file your teeth..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""An ultraliberal, it's a type of li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An ultraliberal, it's a type of liberal. From the Revolution. It's... not the moderate kind."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Haven't you heard?" She nods, peda..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Haven't you heard?" She nods, pedagogically: "I am a nether creature of the forbidden swamp, one of those who pushed the king under a shitwagon and betrayed the Revolution..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*A Deuill*," she pronounces: "*Who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*A Deuill*," she pronounces: "*Who being of great Charme and Guille, sneaketh into the homes of the Godlie*."

fields.Title: Authority: "An appropriate warning to those who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An appropriate warning to those who'd cross the line and pull the city into madness once more...

fields.Title: Composure: "She realizes her small, cold fists..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She realizes her small, cold fists are clenched. She loosens them.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, is this the one with the evi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, is this the one with the evil apes?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "Her eyes return to you. "It isn't e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her eyes return to you. "It isn't enough to call us animals. Even animals aren't animals."

fields.Title: You: ""How about -- it's a ball.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How about -- it's a ball."

fields.Title: You: ""What is *Hell?*""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is *Hell?*"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes," the lieutenant looks at his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes," the lieutenant looks at his watch. "Also, I think we've had enough excitement for today. We *do* have a case to attend to."
fields.Alternate1: "Yes," the lieutenant looks at his watch. "Also, I think we've had enough excitement for today. Remember -- we have a cadaver to attend to."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." The lieutenant returns. "He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." The lieutenant returns. "He has not passed out from it. Perhaps I worried for nothing... Are we still on the reality low-down -- or should we do actual policework now?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "A strange coldness comes over you,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A strange coldness comes over you, as you look at the world. The waves sway the sloop, slowly. That's all.

fields.Title: You: ""What is pale?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is pale?"

fields.Title: Logic: "The negation of being."
fields.Dialogue Text: The negation of being.

fields.Title: You: ""How much pale is there compared to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How much pale is there compared to the world?"

fields.Title: You: ""And... (point north) ...there?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And... (point north) ...there?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""But it is still hard for humans to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But it is still hard for humans to navigate the pale without getting lost. Or having our minds damaged."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Extensively.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Extensively."

fields.Title: Logic: "It's more for her -- way more."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's more for her -- way more.

fields.Title: You: ""*You're* not a civilian passenger?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*You're* not a civilian passenger?"

fields.Title: You: ""Did they... cross it? The Western..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did they... cross it? The Western Plain?"

fields.Title: You: ""I sometimes sense vague shadows of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I sometimes sense vague shadows of a past, and it's not good."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Gone -- like a skipping stone benea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Gone -- like a skipping stone beneath the surface.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "*Off we go...* you see the hanged m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Off we go...* you see the hanged man's mouth open.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "We have time for you to tell me why..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We have time for you to tell me why you need a *reality lowdown*.

fields.Title: Volition: "See? What can he do. You're a grown..."
fields.Dialogue Text: See? What can he do. You're a grown man.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am happy to oblige." She awaits..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am happy to oblige." She awaits your question.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Might I suggest *not* asking them..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Might I suggest *not* asking them all right now? Ma'am Messier will be here later too. And tomorrow. Isn't that true, ma'am?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "*"What?"* She chortles, nearly spil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *"What?"* She chortles, nearly spilling her tea.

fields.Title: You: ""I went on a three-day bender and n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I went on a three-day bender and now need you to explain the world to me."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh?" You've really piqued her curi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh?" You've really piqued her curiosity now. "Then why?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You will find him a big fan of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You will find him a big fan of the *ancient ways* -- it's part of his *condition*."

fields.Title: You: ""What is this *acute encephalopathy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is this *acute encephalopathy*?"

fields.Title: You: ""What -- really?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What -- really?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Encyclopedia: "All right. We're in. I know these *..."]
Electrochemistry: "There is a spark in the air, a live..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a spark in the air, a live wire hanging in the wind -- in your hung over neocortex. Then the sea air cools it down.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The girl in the old-lady rags?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The girl in the old-lady rags?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: You: ""Cop.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cop."

fields.Title: You: ""The *New*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *New*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All three are good to know," the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All three are good to know," the lieutenant looks up from his notes, "when we're out *policing*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's *somewhat* of an exaggerati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's *somewhat* of an exaggeration," the lieutenant interjects. "In reality, ours is a mutually beneficial arrangement."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""These are... unimportant times, de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "These are... unimportant times, detective." She puts her finger to her lips, then points at you: "You and I were born after the dust had settled, a thousandth of a second too late."

fields.Title: You: ""It's definitely the drinking.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's definitely the drinking."

fields.Title: You: "Wipe that urge from your mind and g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wipe that urge from your mind and get back to reality.

fields.Title: You: ""I forgive you -- but only because..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I forgive you -- but only because you're charming."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing's settled. It simply fades..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing's settled. It simply fades away..." She closes her eyes. "Like a lover who has lost their faith. Now, shall we return to reality?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""... then for my daughters'. We had..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... then for my daughters'. We had an obligation to defend our sovereignty. We should have *burned* the whole isola down rather than let them have it."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What world?" The fading pearls of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What world?" The fading pearls of her eyes look to the sea. "The only one, I suppose -- the world of matter and its pale antipode..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""There's a steadily increasing tric..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's a steadily increasing trickle of images. Between the big three they're piecing together a dark grey corona."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Great things are difficult to achi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great things are difficult to achieve. For now, we're viewing the world from the inside -- sideways."

fields.Title: Empathy: "She does not seem convinced that yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She does not seem convinced that you'll be fine. If anything, she is realizing how deep your condition runs.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ma'am." He turns to her again. "Re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am." He turns to her again. "Remember, you're dealing with a very *sensitive* and *impressionable* police officer who is still recovering from a recent medical episode."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A sparkle of lights on the night-ti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A sparkle of lights on the night-time horizon, reflected in the dark sea.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "Silence. She lowers her hand."
fields.Dialogue Text: Silence. She lowers her hand.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "As if it's self-explanatory, beyond..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As if it's self-explanatory, beyond patriotism. A fact.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course." She seems slightly rel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course." She seems slightly relieved.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Some say the damage stems from ext..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some say the damage stems from extreme sensory deprivation. Others argue that pale somehow *consists* of past information, that's degrading. That it's rarefied past, not rarefied matter."

fields.Title: You: ""Are *you* over-radiated?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are *you* over-radiated?"

fields.Title: You: ""What has entroponetics changed the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What has entroponetics changed then?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The pale outweighs reality two to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The pale outweighs reality two to one -- there is more pale than there is matter. And the ratio is slipping."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Some of that assurance is meant for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some of that assurance is meant for herself, as much as it's meant for you. She must have *a lot* on the line here.

fields.Title: You: ""That we continue to persist at all..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That we continue to persist at all is a testament to our faith in one another."

fields.Title: You: ""You needn't have worried.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You needn't have worried."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, well..." he thinks. "The rest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, well..." he thinks. "The rest of us have dealt with it for thousands of years, so..." He looks around, a little uncomfortable now.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "ORG: Occident-Revachol-Graad."
fields.Dialogue Text: ORG: Occident-Revachol-Graad.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "You should ask the Paledriver about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should ask the Paledriver about this. See what she says.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""How *truly* curious -- a sort of p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How *truly* curious -- a sort of philosopher-detective!"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Actually," she turns to the lieute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually," she turns to the lieutenant, "I've heard the analogy made by a blindingly modern school of philosophy called *karperie*. It may not be as far fetched as it sounds."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You will find he doesn't approve o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You will find he doesn't approve of foreign wisdom. It's part of his *condition*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Some sort of... krill hunter? No,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some sort of... krill hunter? No, wait..." Joyce raises her eyebrows. "You're an ancient ruin, a symbol of hubris and decay, half-submerged in some salty sea."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah!" She spreads her arms almost a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah!" She spreads her arms almost as wide. "*This* is the pier of Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 33A, where the tenants have been kind enough to rent me a slot..."

fields.Title: You: ""So, we're in an unimportant part o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, we're in an unimportant part of an important place?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's not really a sea. It's the Ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not really a sea. It's the Bay of Revachol. And the bay feeds into the ocean."

fields.Title: You: ""What's the name of this island?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the name of this island?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Perhaps." Her earrings chime as sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps." Her earrings chime as she nods. "My intellectual vanity will be my undoing."

fields.Title: Logic: "And the crown on your head as you l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And the crown on your head as you lay in the casket.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Young people who dye their hair fu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Young people who dye their hair funny colours and wear old people's clothes are stupid and their little rebellion is self-defeating..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah, yes..." She looks hesitant. "T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes..." She looks hesitant. "This is not very *central* to reality, is it?"

fields.Title: You: ""I still want to know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still want to know."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Precisomundo*!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Precisomundo*!"

fields.Title: You: ""This abbreviation -- what does it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This abbreviation -- what does it stand for?"

fields.Title: You: ""So I'm basically going to avoid th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I'm basically going to avoid this subject and ask the next question in this line of inquiry."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""And if those authorities drink so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And if those authorities drink so hard they need help recalling the basic terms of reality -- well, I am here to help." She bows and smiles.

fields.Title: Half Light: "It's sharp."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's sharp.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "That dialect is Ubi Sunt?. You reco..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That dialect is Ubi Sunt?. You recognize the quote from somewhere. A play, written way back in the Franconigerian century...

fields.Title: You: ""That settles that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That settles that."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A fitting punishment," she smirks...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A fitting punishment," she smirks. "To be forgotten, if not forgiven. Save a prayer for us in our *châteaus* on Ozonne and in Stella Maris."

fields.Title: You: ""You have daughters?" (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "You have daughters?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I don't know about things of that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know about things of that scale, my expertise lies in nations and trade routes, one or several layers below *everything*."

fields.Title: You: ""Really?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes -- so I can spite Evrart and s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- so I can spite Evrart and spoil his plans for this place. I'm a petty person, I admit."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant observes you both, s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant observes you both, silently. He adjusts his glasses.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""History, detective. They built thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "History, detective. They built this city to *resolve* History -- our part in it at least, our centuries."

fields.Title: You: ""Got it. Tell me something else the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Got it. Tell me something else then."

fields.Title: Half Light: "You hear your pulse rise, the air f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear your pulse rise, the air feels caustic and cold suddenly.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No, nameless detective of the Citi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, nameless detective of the Citizens Militia. I am a member of the *Entroponetic Business Class*. I'm cleared and trained for 22 days of pale transit annually."

fields.Title: You: ""This investigation will be my mast..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This investigation will be my masterpiece. The one they remember me by. I promise."

fields.Title: Logic: "Someone *else* you've met may have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone *else* you've met may have been *exposed* as well. The strange grey-haired woman in her lorry.

fields.Title: You: ""Off we go into the wild pale yonde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Off we go into the wild pale yonder."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right lieutenant. I'll cont..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right lieutenant. I'll continue later."

fields.Title: You: ""I got so drunk I forgot literally..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I got so drunk I forgot literally everything."

fields.Title: You: ""I woke up in a trashed hotel room,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I woke up in a trashed hotel room, superstar-style. Before that everything's a blank."

fields.Title: Empathy: "This person is not easily disorient..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This person is not easily disoriented, but you've done it.

fields.Title: You: ""No time to explain -- just give me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No time to explain -- just give me the low-down."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Encyclopedia: "All right. We're in. I know these *..."]
Joyce Messier: ""I've never heard of an *apocalypti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've never heard of an *apocalyptic* medical condition, but then reality is a strange place. Ask away, officer -- I'll help however I can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course," she tosses her permane..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course," she tosses her permanent-waved hair. "Ask me anything."

fields.Title: You: ""What is Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 33A?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 33A?"

fields.Title: You: ""So, we're on the periphery? Basica..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, we're on the periphery? Basically nobodies?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I think it's fair to say so. Marti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think it's fair to say so. Martinaise is about..." She points across the water, where the skyscrapers rise...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah, yes -- back to the *low-down*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes -- back to the *low-down*."

fields.Title: You: ""Which one?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which one?"

fields.Title: You: ""So I'm basically a thrall to forei..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I'm basically a thrall to foreign interests?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They called it the *International..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They called it the *International Zone* -- because no nation wanted to claim responsibility. The RCM restored peace where the Coalition failed. A true-blue citizens' initiative," she smiles. "They will never forgive you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Well, it's either bariatric surger..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, it's either bariatric surgery -- or long term alcohol use."

fields.Title: You: ""Dios mío!" (Draw a cross.) "A LIBE..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Dios mío!" (Draw a cross.) "A LIBERAL!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Honestly..." she pauses. "I may ha..."]
Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""When the dust settled, the liberal..."]
Joyce Messier: ""This *place* is an unmarked micros..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This *place* is an unmarked microsettlement on the coast of Martinaise..." She gestures toward a collection of cinderblock dwellings covered by a highly carcinogenic roofing material.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant glances at you from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant glances at you from the corner of his eye.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes -- what is the pale?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- what is the pale?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course -- ask away." She seems..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course -- ask away." She seems slightly relieved.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, and what is an isola?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, and what is an isola?"

fields.Title: You: "Look to the sea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look to the sea...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She observes your eyes scanning the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She observes your eyes scanning the horizon, then breaks the silence, slowly.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "It remains a mystery what you mean..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It remains a mystery what you mean by this *something close*. This isn't about you. It's about *reality*.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Okay." She concedes. "The pale is..."]
You: ""Is it *the pale* or *pale*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is it *the pale* or *pale*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It is possible to force dimensions..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is possible to force dimensions on the pale -- in modern times we can even compress its latitude, bouncing radio waves from one end to the other. Shortening the path."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It feels terrible. Absolutely terr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It feels terrible. Absolutely terrible. International standards strictly limit civilian travellers to six days of pale exposure per year..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""There *are* signs of pretermodern..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There *are* signs of pretermodern crossings. Successful navigation of the pale relies not just on technical know-how, but intensive psychological preparation. Some of these tactics have been known for thousands of years."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing. We remain powerless befor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. We remain powerless before the pale. The only real advance in pale transit is the speed with which an aerostatic craft can pierce it. Less exposure leads to less... *effects* later."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing. Just alcohol fumes and bl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. Just alcohol fumes and blackout."

fields.Title: You: ""You were right. It's disco.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were right. It's disco."

fields.Title: You: "Stay silent."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stay silent.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes?" She's waiting for another te..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes?" She's waiting for another term.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes!" The lieutenant takes a step..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes!" The lieutenant takes a step closer to you, rubbing his hands together. "There is a *stranger* reason, isn't there?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Encyclopedia: "All right. We're in. I know these *..."]
Jump to: [Encyclopedia: "All right. We're in. I know these *..."]
Joyce Messier: ""Of course you're not, my dear. I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course you're not, my dear. I'm just terrible at guessing games."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah, yes. There's something very sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes. There's something very satisfying about discussing the fundamental facts of reality. Go ahead."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes," the lieutenant steps in to m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes," the lieutenant steps in to make a gesture encompassing you both: "*We* are the Revachol Citizens Militia."

fields.Title: You: ""Got it. Another question, then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Got it. Another question, then."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What I am *not* is a basic term of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What I am *not* is a basic term of reality," she smiles.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Honestly..." she pauses. "I may ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly..." she pauses. "I may have even *preferred* it, had the communards won. Who knows? They might really have built something better. But they didn't, because they lost."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm afraid you'll find that *every..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid you'll find that *every* woman is a Devil Woman, detective. There are only *aesthetic* differences between one and the other."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""There are those who would call it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are those who would call it *Hell*..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""But you already have," she looks a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But you already have," she looks around. "And you're doing just fine, despite the rubble."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""There's a steadily increasing tric..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's a steadily increasing trickle of images. Between the big three scientific contributors, they're piecing together a dark grey corona."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""Let me ask you something else.""]
You: ""What do you see?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you see?"

fields.Title: You: ""The wind is sweeping the waters...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The wind is sweeping the waters..."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Was he just... worried? That you wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Was he just... worried? That you would find out something awful?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I don't think your colleague would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think your colleague would appreciate that -- he has already been so patient with this whole... exercise."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know any of this...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know any of this..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She stares at you, head tilted to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She stares at you, head tilted to the side, with a slightly concerned look on her face.

fields.Title: You: ""I want to know what *you* are.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I want to know what *you* are."
fields.Alternate1: "Seriously, I want to know what *you* are."

fields.Title: You: "What is... (Reach for something fun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is... (Reach for something fundamental.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""You have mis-imagined it. I don't..."]
Jump to: [Joyce Messier: "She looks up: "It's like the crowni..."]
Joyce Messier: ""Up to my gills, officer.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Up to my gills, officer."

fields.Title: You: ""It's shrinking. There is more and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's shrinking. There is more and more of the world."

fields.Title: You: ""It's not extreme at all. It's goin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not extreme at all. It's going to happen."
fields.Alternate1: "It's not extreme at all. I know it's going to happen."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Hmhm..." Her eyes tense. Crow's fe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmhm..." Her eyes tense. Crow's feet radiate from them. She observes you: your bloodshot eyes and swollen face.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. Carried in the hulls of airsh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Carried in the hulls of airships," she nods. "It's a horrific job. Automation will abolish it, soon."

fields.Title: You: "Ask for Kim to step away while you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ask for Kim to step away while you discuss the pale.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["pier.joyce_pale_kimturndown_one"]  and  Variable["TASK.what_is_pale"]  and  Variable["TASK.what_is_pale_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere()

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Everyone wants to talk about themse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everyone wants to talk about themselves. She will, in time.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "ORG: Occident-Revachol-Graad."
fields.Dialogue Text: ORG: Occident-Revachol-Graad.

fields.Title: You: ""Aren't all philosophers detectives?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Aren't all philosophers detectives?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Why not?" She tosses her head. "I'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not?" She tosses her head. "I've heard the analogy made by a blindingly modern school of philosophy called *karperie*. It may not be as far fetched as it sounds."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually.... that's not why I need..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually.... that's not why I need you to give me the low-down."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." The lieutenant takes a step..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." The lieutenant takes a step closer to you. "Why don't you tell Mrs. Messier what you told me, hm?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A pre-revolutionary tenement. Old..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A pre-revolutionary tenement. Old buildings are called *tenements*, you see, and new buildings *batiments*, after *les batiments noveau*. But 33A and 33B are not *noveau*, they're old." She looks up at the crumbling facade...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No. You're not joking at all, are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. You're not joking at all, are you?" She sighs. "Well, ask away, officer -- I'll help however I can."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a disco holdover myself.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a disco holdover myself."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Of course -- no time for silly infr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course -- no time for silly infracultures. There are more pressing, reality-centric questions to be asked.

fields.Title: You: ""We got this covered -- about anoth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We got this covered -- about another basic reality term."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The New, a cultural era -- and the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The New, a cultural era -- and the name of the decade it ravished, the Thirties. It came out of post-revolutionary Revachol. It was... ultraliberal."

fields.Title: You: ""So you're saying he *didn't* vanis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you're saying he *didn't* vanish in a  puff of stardust?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "For some reason your mind is a veri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For some reason your mind is a veritable repository of Guillaume le Million lyrics, trivia, and b-sides. But the time to explore this is when you're alone, facing a mirror perhaps? Right now it would derail the reality low-down.

fields.Title: You: ""So I'm basically one of the good g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I'm basically one of the good guys?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Permit me to conclude with this: *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Permit me to conclude with this: *who* you are -- to me -- is the police. The only legitimate law enforcement authority in Revachol..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Glad to have been of assistance --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Glad to have been of assistance -- the little that I know.... anything else?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Glad to have been of assistance --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Glad to have been of assistance -- the little that I know. Anything else I can do?"

fields.Title: You: ""I know you've got a lot riding on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know you've got a lot riding on me. I won't let you down."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No," she shakes her head, slowly...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No," she shakes her head, slowly. "Not like me. I am the nether creature of the forbidden swamp, who pushed the king under a *shitwagon* and betrayed the Revolution..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""...steal, kill and destroy?" She c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...steal, kill and destroy?" She counters, quick as a whip. "That they say we've been doing for over four decades now. Perhaps regrettably, I've had my fill for this century..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They're like you and I, I suppose...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're like you and I, I suppose. Living organisms don't identify with abstractions. Elysium is for particular beings."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am sorry, dear," she looks aroun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am sorry, dear," she looks around. "It must sound quite terrifying through the acute encephalopathy. Even scientific positivism isn't entirely convinced about what we're dealing with here..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Actually, yes. The thought did cro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, yes. The thought did cross my mind when Mademoiselle Lilienne over there told me about the fresh produce these women sell to restaurants on the Delta."

fields.Title: Shivers: "A frisson lifts the hair on the bac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A frisson lifts the hair on the back of your arm. Wind sweeps the surface of the bay.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She looks up: "It's like the crowni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She looks up: "It's like the crowning of the world. It's insane. Very *disco*. You'd love it."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, forget all this stuff. Let m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, forget all this stuff. Let me ask something else."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The pale is not, technically speak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The pale is not, technically speaking, part of *reality*..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Let's continue with something else..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's continue with something else, alright?" She leans against the railing: "You can ask about *anything* else in the world. Anything."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "You could sneak back, later, when t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could sneak back, later, when the lieutenant is *not* here... unless you can convince him to step aside?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It is the opposite of reality.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is the opposite of reality."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, another term then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, another term then."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Confederate Republic of Mesque..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Confederate Republic of Mesque -- the world's largest state by territory -- has fallen into an especially nihilistic strain of nationalism lately.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's return to reality, please."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's return to reality, please." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""Six thousand kilometres from the e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Six thousand kilometres from the end of the world?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes -- that is enough. Many cities..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- that is enough. Many cities are built *much* closer."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There's a slippery article in there..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a slippery article in there...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She closes her eyes and breathes ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She closes her eyes and breathes out heavily: "... the most *disco* thing you will ever see."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Entroponetics*," she corrects, "i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Entroponetics*," she corrects, "is the scientific study of the pale. Or a recent iteration of it, by way of Graad. The study of the pale reaches back 6,000 years -- the Perikarnassians called it the Western Plain."

fields.Title: You: ""It's growing. There is more and mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's growing. There is more and more of the pale."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Most people -- and indeed most pri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Most people -- and indeed most private and government sector organizations; entire civilizations and religions even -- find handy ways to ignore, or downplay that knowledge."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right. This is all new to m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right. This is all new to me."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Beyond curious... Tell me -- what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Beyond curious... Tell me -- what do you *think* of the pale?"

fields.Title: You: ""Who am I to think *anything* of it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who am I to think *anything* of it?"

fields.Title: Volition: "Yeah, you still aren't over the fea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, you still aren't over the fear that something bad might happen. He expressly said you've had enough excitement for today.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine." He steps away with his note..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine." He steps away with his notes.

fields.Title: You: ""Now -- what is the pale?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now -- what is the pale?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Good luck, detectives." She nods y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good luck, detectives." She nods you good-bye.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, *all* of them.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, *all* of them."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""There may be *some* detectives who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There may be *some* detectives who are not philosophers."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, a spirit quest sounds like th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, a spirit quest sounds like the thing I'm on."

fields.Title: You: ""You mentioned a sea. What sea is t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mentioned a sea. What sea is this?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "A brief spike of longing in her upr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A brief spike of longing in her upright body. The dots under her eyelids shake.

fields.Title: You: ""You're a smart woman.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a smart woman."

fields.Title: Logic: "You're no dummy yourself."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're no dummy yourself.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait -- Guillaume le Million? I wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- Guillaume le Million? I was just thinking about that guy! Whatever happened to him?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm afraid no, but then again -- o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid no, but then again -- one can't be entirely sure. It's all part of his *mystique*. Ask someone else and you may get a more champagne-coloured take..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Truly moralist of you. The Coaliti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Truly moralist of you. The Coalition Government would applaud you for staying out of politics. And yet..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""There's nothing *basic* about your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's nothing *basic* about your role, detective. It's true that the RCM keeps everything the way our seemingly *permanent* provisional rulers like it..." She leans in.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yet on the other hand -- I know th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yet on the other hand -- I know these people. I deal with them daily. Let me tell you, dear, they are not fans of you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The Revolution," she says."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Revolution," she says.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's a neurological disorder, caus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a neurological disorder, caused by a lack of vitamin B in the brain. Symptoms include retrograde amnesia. It's... quite serious -- you should get yourself checked out."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "What this boils down to is this *re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What this boils down to is this *reality* thing is stupid. Blow this joint, grab a bottle and drain that shit right down your throat.

fields.Title: You: ""I forgive you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I forgive you."

fields.Title: You: ""Elysium... The world needs a term..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Elysium... The world needs a term of endearment."

fields.Title: You: ""Doesn't sound like any kind of dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Doesn't sound like any kind of disco I'd like to go to."

fields.Title: You: ""The pale...? And what do you mean..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The pale...? And what do you mean *corona*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of bodies of water and forest-cove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of bodies of water and forest-covered surfaces, clusters of light where the cities lie. You've seen the montage, we all have -- this world is enough," she concludes.

fields.Title: You: ""I've got a clear picture. Let's pr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've got a clear picture. Let's proceed to another term."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't care about disco, I only c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't care about disco, I only care about the Commune."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course, lieutenant," she bows,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, lieutenant," she bows, then turns to you. "Let's try something else."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean it's not part of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean it's not part of *reality*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Twenty-two kilometres from the cen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Twenty-two kilometres from the centre of the world. That soldering iron is the Bank of the World building. The bottom floors are INSURCOM -- *Coalition Government* Insulindian Mission Command."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The nations of the Occident. Or mi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The nations of the Occident. Or migrant workers from Semenine and Iilmaraa, depending on your creed."

fields.Title: You: ""The negation of...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The negation of..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's right -- the negation of be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right -- the negation of being." She tightens her hood around her neck, it's cold outside.

fields.Title: You: ""Who says and who argues?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who says and who argues?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: "She's looking out toward the sea, w..."]
Joyce Messier: ""Is this the first time you're hear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is this the first time you're hearing this? Do you really not remember anything?"

fields.Title: You: "Gulp."
fields.Dialogue Text: Gulp.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." The lieutenant returns. "Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." The lieutenant returns. "You have not passed out from it. Perhaps I worried for nothing... Are we still on the reality low-down -- or should we do actual policework now?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Dark orange flames reflect in her g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dark orange flames reflect in her green eyes. An oil fire on the ocean.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "That poor woman must have stories t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That poor woman must have stories to tell like you wouldn't imagine...

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The doubt is fully formed in your h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The doubt is fully formed in your head -- the alien feeling persists -- yet something's still missing. You have finished mulling over the *Jamais Vu* thought, but your Conceptualization skills are not nuanced enough to make sense of it...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She nods, attentively."
fields.Dialogue Text: She nods, attentively.

fields.Title: You: ""What *world* is this?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What *world* is this?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Mostly the urban middle class, I b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mostly the urban middle class, I believe. This was once *primo* real estate. Before the cannons lopped four or five stories off..."

fields.Title: Logic: "She refers to your corresponding ag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She refers to your corresponding ages.

fields.Title: You: ""So am I.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So am I."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Speak for yourself, officer. I'm w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Speak for yourself, officer. I'm well known in certain parts. As to the place, you're right. We are..." She points across the water, where the skyscrapers rise...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Looks like a sullen and rebellious..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like a sullen and rebellious member of a teen *infraculture*."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Suddenly you're not so sure *you're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Suddenly you're not so sure *you're* part of the supraculture...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My reality-impaired colleague is n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My reality-impaired colleague is not so far off..." The lieutenant wanders back into the conversation -- he's been sorting his notes.

fields.Title: You: ""Got it -- let's take it back to re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Got it -- let's take it back to reality central for the next one."

fields.Title: You: ""That's it for the *who I am* part..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it for the *who I am* part then."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "In case he goes down later, souring..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In case he goes down later, souring the entire portfolio.

fields.Title: You: ""You've got a predatory streak.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've got a predatory streak."

fields.Title: You: ""Wanna... fuck?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wanna... fuck?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""With due respect to our overlords,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "With due respect to our overlords, the eternal *caretaker* government that keeps Martinaise a monument to the efficacy of its artillery..."

fields.Title: You: ""What is it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is it?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The camera of her mind glides over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The camera of her mind glides over the surface of the water.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "But... she wants to tell you."
fields.Dialogue Text: But... she wants to tell you.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*Isola* is a Messinian word for a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Isola* is a Messinian word for a continent of matter, enveloped on all sides by the pale. Also: isolation, or land mass. We used to believe there was only one. In the last four centuries we have discovered seven..."

fields.Title: Shivers: "OF REVACHOL."
fields.Dialogue Text: OF REVACHOL.

fields.Title: You: ""What is *entroponetic*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is *entroponetic*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, it is..." Her lungs deflate, h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, it is..." Her lungs deflate, her words sound like a sigh, "...*so* difficult for us."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Perhaps that explains her strange p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Perhaps that explains her strange pining after the Revolution? Some degraded early memories...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You really didn't know. This does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You really didn't know. This does *not* spell good for the investigation, detective. If you don't know even this, then..." She stops mid-sentence.

fields.Title: You: ""It'll be a fucking disaster, I kno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It'll be a fucking disaster, I know it. All those people will die."

fields.Title: Volition: "...is what you want to do. But shou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...is what you want to do. But should you? He expressly stated you shouldn't hear about it. What if it renders you mad? Or catatonic? *Or* makes you lose your memory again?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He's being sarcastic."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's being sarcastic.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is understandable -- but *per..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That is understandable -- but *perhaps* it's better not to eat all your candy at once?"

fields.Title: You: ""What times are these?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What times are these?"
fields.Alternate1: "Tell me what times are these again?"

fields.Title: You: ""Keep guessing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Keep guessing."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. We are on an island in an oce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. We are on an island in an ocean. The world's largest body of water -- the Insulindic."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, now explain the same thing -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, now explain the same thing -- but to a child."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It involved *lots* of partying, as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It involved *lots* of partying, as you might imagine. And champagne coloured *everything*. By the looks of it -- that would have been when you came of age. Now..." She raises her eyebrow at you.

fields.Title: You: ""Back to those basic terms of reali..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Back to those basic terms of reality then."

fields.Title: You: ""Why?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Be my guest." She takes a sip from..."]
You: ""What are you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""When the dust settled, the liberal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "When the dust settled, the liberals were the only ones left to clean up the mess. By virtue of their survival they were handed enormous power to shape the future..." She turns her gaze to the delta. "This was all our last generation managed."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Beneath her waterproof raincoat and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Beneath her waterproof raincoat and silk shirt is a body imbibed in Numb 12 perfume. You are suddenly and intimately aware of it.

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks. Okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks. Okay."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""This place could use a competent m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This place could use a competent manager. There's so much to be done. But then, I'll never get around to it, will I?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Great bodies of water, forest-cove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great bodies of water, forest-covered surfaces... clusters of light where the cities lie. You've seen the montage, we all have -- this world is enough," she concludes.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The lieutenant's right, let's chan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The lieutenant's right, let's change topics?" She gives you a little wink: "What do you want to know? Anything!"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The water, the light... It's as tho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The water, the light... It's as though you're seeing it for the *first* time.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A sparkle of lights on the horizon,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A sparkle of lights on the horizon, like evening stars above the curvature of the planet.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I hope we are able to continue as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hope we are able to continue as friends despite my scaly bulk. And the treacheries committed by my people against the Suzerain and the Commune."
fields.Alternate1: "I hope we are able to continue as friends, despite my deeply felt need to infiltrate and betray the Revolution. And then ensnare you to financial *seruice*."
fields.Alternate2: "I hope we are able to remain friends despite my scaly bulk and my love of regicide and homo-sexuality. The loss of sovereignty was not our plan all along, I assure you."
fields.Alternate3: "I hope we are able to continue as friends despite my scaly bulk. And my intimidating liberal credentials. This was not the plan all along."
fields.Alternate4: "I hope so. I hope we are able to continue as friends despite my scaly bulk. And the insanity, bloodshed, and transfer of wealth that took place here. It was not *the plan all along*."

fields.Title: You: ""What's so funny about that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's so funny about that?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing, nothing, it's just..." Sh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing, nothing, it's just..." She wipes a tear from her eye. "True, that's all. The uniforms, the language... Let's have another question about reality, shall we?"

fields.Title: You: "What is... (Think of something clos..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is... (Think of something close to you.)

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It's on the tip of your tongue -- a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's on the tip of your tongue -- a *doubt* of sorts, already in your head -- but it's not fully formed yet. You have to wait and return to this later, once the *Jamais Vu* thought is complete.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "What is... all of this? The scent,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is... all of this? The scent, the sound, the air?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's difficult to describe -- or e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's difficult to describe -- or even measure -- something whose fundamental property is the suspension of properties: physical, epistemological, linguistic..."

fields.Title: You: ""What does this over-radiation feel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What does this over-radiation feel like?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "She's over-radiated. And then some."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's over-radiated. And then some.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm getting a sense of who I am, b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm getting a sense of who I am, but no, I didn't know this."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then tell me -- what do you *think..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then tell me -- what do you *think* of the pale?"

fields.Title: You: ""Do *lorry drivers* pass the pale?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do *lorry drivers* pass the pale?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It doesn't look like you're *doing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It doesn't look like you're *doing* the same. The suggestion was meant in earnest, detective. Live life."

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, can I talk to the ma'am alone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, can I talk to the ma'am alone for a second?"

fields.Title: You: ""But won't I be *lazy* if I don't d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But won't I be *lazy* if I don't do it all now?"

fields.Title: You: ""A supra-natural event took place."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A supra-natural event took place." (Point to your head.) "Within my head -- on alcohol."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't be fazed, madam. He function..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't be fazed, madam. He functions perfectly well. He only needs a... *lowdown* on all of reality."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You will find that *most* things c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You will find that *most* things concern the coming apocalypse. It's part of his *condition*."

fields.Title: You: ""What kind of city is Revachol?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kind of city is Revachol?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, that's Martinaise. What's *R..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, that's Martinaise. What's *Revachol*?" (Continue.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She opens them: "This place used to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She opens them: "This place used to be a province, a workers' resort before the city swallowed it and the artillery did its work. The reeds are the real star of the show here now. The further down the coast, the wilder it gets."
fields.Alternate1: She opens them: "As I told you: Martinaise used to be a province, a workers' resort before the city swallowed it and the artillery did its part. Now the reeds are the real star of the show here. The further down the coast, the wilder it gets."

fields.Title: You: ""You were here as a teenager?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were here as a teenager?"

fields.Title: You: ""What is that?" (Point to Cindy the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is that?" (Point to Cindy the SKULL.)

fields.Title: You: ""Infra... culture?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Infra... culture?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Those days are long behind me..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those days are long behind me..." She looks inland with sarcastic wistfulness. "And even in the early Thirties I would say I was more of a *New* girl. Disco was a minor, but still enjoyable facet of the whole thing for me."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Wasn't it Guillaume le Million who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wasn't it Guillaume le Million who said: *If you can remember the New, you weren't there*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Anyway," she concludes. "What othe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anyway," she concludes. "What other basic facets of reality should we discuss?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing more nor less than the de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing more nor less than the de facto law enforcement body of post-revolutionary Revachol, detective."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The RCM's responsibilities are def..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The RCM's responsibilities are defined by the Emergency, Wayfarer, and Aliments Acts -- three pieces of legislation keeping the city in a -- let's be honest -- laissez-faire stasis to the benefit of foreign capital."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Revacholians get to keep the peace..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Revacholians get to keep the peace in Revachol, and the Coalition doesn't have to worry about it..." He coughs. "Anyway, sorry to intrude. Please continue."

fields.Title: Empathy: "She conveys it in short, cold burst..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She conveys it in short, cold bursts, trying not to invest too deeply in the condition of this doomed detective.

fields.Title: Composure: "She raises the corner of her mouth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She raises the corner of her mouth smirking, revealing a canine.

fields.Title: You: ""Cool. I *liberate* pretty hard mys..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool. I *liberate* pretty hard myself."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Are you *liberated* enough to offe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you *liberated* enough to offer up your home on a plate for financial colonists?" She looks you in the eye. "No, I think not. Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- do you find me frightening?"

fields.Title: You: ""Would *you* have done something di..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Would *you* have done something differently?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't feel like I have got the w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't feel like I have got the whole picture yet."

fields.Title: You: ""Inside sideways? What *shape* is t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Inside sideways? What *shape* is this world then?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes." She pauses. "Pale covers 72%..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." She pauses. "Pale covers 72% of the surface. There are grey flares and prominences, even arcs above entire isolas... The images are blurry, but if there was a sphere in there it certainly looks like it fractured a long time ago."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. And then everything will be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. And then everything will be okay?"

fields.Title: You: ""A fractured corona doesn't feel li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A fractured corona doesn't feel like it's gonna bring anyone *together*."

fields.Title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Splat-splat!" From a dilapidated b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Splat-splat!" From a dilapidated balcony, Cindy the SKULL gives Joyce the evil eye, her red paintbrush held to her throat...

fields.Title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Splat-splat!" From a dilapidated b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Splat-splat!" From a dilapidated balcony, a young girl in odd clothes gives Joyce the evil eye, a red paintbrush held to her throat...

fields.Title: Shivers: "THE WORLD IS A SUZERAINTY"
fields.Dialogue Text: THE WORLD IS A SUZERAINTY

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am sorry, detective," she looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am sorry, detective," she looks around. "Philosophically speaking -- it must sound *quite terrifying*. Even scientific positivism isn't entirely convinced about what we're dealing with here..."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't want to. I want to know wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't want to. I want to know what the pale is."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "You could sneak back -- later, when..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could sneak back -- later, when he's *not* around... unless you can convince him to step aside?

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A sparkle of lights on the horizon,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A sparkle of lights on the horizon, like morning stars above the curvature of the planet.

fields.Title: You: ""What makes Revachol great?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What makes Revachol great?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. *Who* built this city?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. *Who* built this city?"

fields.Title: You: ""If we're surrounded by pale, how d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If we're surrounded by pale, how do you get from isola to isola?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Dammit, you're a grown man, the lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dammit, you're a grown man, the lieutenant thinks. Shouldn't have gotten *protective* here.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "All right. We're in. I know these *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All right. We're in. I know these *all* look good, but begin with the first, okay.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Vast, lukewarm and unknowable. Flow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Vast, lukewarm and unknowable. Flowing in and out of sight.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Wonderful.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wonderful."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""This... *reality*?" She pulls her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This... *reality*?" She pulls her hood closer around her neck.

fields.Title: You: ""By learning about the world I hope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By learning about the world I hope to learn more about myself."

fields.Title: Composure: "She's trying to see whether you're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's trying to see whether you're bluffing -- it's easy not to fidget. You're *not*.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Such an acute encephalopathy... ju..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Such an acute encephalopathy... just doesn't seem possible." She puts her beverage down and stares at you. "Surely you're joking..."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A wink. There is a mischievous stre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A wink. There is a mischievous streak to him egging you on. This might go beyond mere strategy.

fields.Title: You: ""Where are we?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where are we?"

fields.Title: You: ""You said *pale*. What is pale?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said *pale*. What is pale?"
fields.Alternate1: "I want to know what the pale is."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["pier.joyce_reality_pale_question_unclocked"]  or  Variable["TASK.what_is_pale"] == true)  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["pier.joyce_pale_kimturndown_one"] == false

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Revachol -- Revachol is what you c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Revachol -- Revachol is what you call a *city*."

fields.Title: You: ""*Baby?*""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Baby?*"

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me about another, perhaps eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me about another, perhaps even *more* fundamental aspect of reality."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""She prefers a fantasy world -- an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She prefers a fantasy world -- an *infraculture* with its own dress code and vernacular. It is an illusion, I'm afraid. There is no refuge from the supraculture."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You? You are an officer of the RCM..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You? You are an officer of the RCM," she says energetically.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's not just me, detective. All o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not just me, detective. All of Martinaise has placed its chips on your success. I pray we've all bet wisely."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, what's an ultra?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, what's an ultra?"

fields.Title: You: ""It certainly doesn't feel like I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It certainly doesn't feel like I'm fine."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's lovely, really. I'm thinking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's lovely, really. I'm thinking of buying it."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Oh, you want a *picture* of the wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, you want a *picture* of the world?" She raises her finger to her lips. "There is no complete set yet, dear. They're having some trouble reaching orbit."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Suddenly you're conscious of yourse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Suddenly you're conscious of yourself standing there, on... whatever this all is. Your arms hang down by your sides.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Go ahead, officer -- ask me someth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go ahead, officer -- ask me something *else*." The woman looks at you attentively.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Are you sure you're sure? Your col..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure you're sure? Your colleague seemed adamant..."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing. Observe the large body..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing. Observe the large body of water swelling. Cold...

fields.Title: You: ""Are you saying I'm ruined?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you saying I'm ruined?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""By that I mean conflicts. Ideologi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "By that I mean conflicts. Ideological conflicts. The stuff of men."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""Yes, he lost his mind," Tillbrook..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, he lost his mind," Tillbrook answers, finger on the trigger. "Don't worry, Émile..." He pulls on it slowly. Slowly now... "He'll find it again."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Indeed. There is a term of endearm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Indeed. There is a term of endearment they coined for it. In the Dolorian century, when humanity was *high* on this world, discovering more and more of it -- these archipelagos included..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""No, Lieutenant Du Bois. I'm 'Entro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, Lieutenant Du Bois. I'm 'Entroponetic Business Class.' I'm cleared -- and trained -- for 22 days of pale transit annually."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "They had not travelled the entire c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They had not travelled the entire circumference of the Perikarnassian super-isola. It was not merely in the West -- it was everywhere. Even then; surrounding them...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Of course, how *silly* of me. Anot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, how *silly* of me. Another basic term perhaps?" She stands attentively.

fields.Title: You: ""Its advance can only be stopped wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Its advance can only be stopped with immediate, total, ruthless Communism."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Some of that assurance is meant for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some of that assurance is meant for herself, as much as it's meant for you. She must have *a lot* on the line here.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""...you have me -- I will assist yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...you have me -- I will assist you in any way I can. Even if we have to do it one basic term at a time." She gives you a slight bow.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""One and all," she closes her eyes...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One and all," she closes her eyes. "They say pale is death, but for the Universe."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It's quite easy: every hundred yea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's quite easy: every hundred years or so our species gets together to decide what's next: who gets shot in the head and who gets the mineral rights -- it's a real *kerfuffle*."

fields.Title: You: ""Right. Let's get to work lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. Let's get to work lieutenant."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But I did. Anyway..." He looks aro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But I did. Anyway..." He looks around, a little uncomfortable now.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We may be here awhile, then." She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We may be here awhile, then." She takes a long sip of tea. "Ask away, officer -- I'll help however I can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I've never heard of a *nationalist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've never heard of a *nationalistic* medical condition, but then reality is a strange place. Ask away, officer -- I'll help however I can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We're in Martinaise, baby.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're in Martinaise, baby."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Many of the RCM's fashions, even w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Many of the RCM's fashions, even weapon preferences, borrow heavily from classic Vespertine cop shows. My precinct alone has three officers who go by the name *Ace*..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ha! I can see that, yes. I dabbled..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha! I can see that, yes. I dabbled in those dark arts myself -- not so long ago." She smiles enigmatically. "I assure you, it was a thoroughly *supracultural* phenomenon. All-permeating. Downright mandatory."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The post-revolutionary decade was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The post-revolutionary decade was a disaster for the Coalition Government. Revachol in the Twenties was hell, especially on the west side of the river: gang warfare, a botched privatisation scheme, a nuclear pile meltdown..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That seems... unlikely.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That seems... unlikely."

fields.Title: Volition: "She won't manoeuvre her way out of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She won't manoeuvre her way out of this one.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Perhaps you thought we'd gone exti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps you thought we'd gone extinct. After all, no sane person identifies as an *ultra* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks into your eye. "Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- are you repulsed?"
fields.Alternate1: "I can see you thought we'd gone extinct. After all, no sane person identifies as an *ultraliberal* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks into your eye. "You're a man of the left, no? Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- are you repulsed?"
fields.Alternate2: "I can see you thought we'd gone extinct. After all, no sane person identifies as an *ultraliberal* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks into your eye. "You've got Revachol in your blood, a real nationalist, no? Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- are you repulsed?"
fields.Alternate3: "I can see you thought our kind were all extinct. After all, no sane person identifies as *this* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks into your eye. "I can see we're not so different, you know... Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- do you find me frightening?"
fields.Alternate4: "I can see you thought we'd gone extinct. After all, no sane person identifies as an *ultraliberal* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks into your eye. "You're a centrist at heart, a real moralist, no? Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- do you find me frightening?"

fields.Title: You: ""You're a monster.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a monster."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "But only because you like pearlesce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But only because you like pearlescent teeth and those light green eyes...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah, you know more than you let on...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, you know more than you let on..." She gives you a coy little smile. "Philosopher-Detective of Precinct 41."
fields.Alternate1: "Ah, maybe you remember more than you let on..." She gives you a coy little smile. "Despite whatever brain damage the alcohol may have inflicted."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, whatever else I am, I'm also..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, whatever else I am, I'm also a mother. And a wife." She closes her eyes, then opens them again. "Now -- shall we return to reality?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""There is a term of endearment they..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is a term of endearment they coined for it. In the Dolorian century, when humanity was *high* on this world, discovering more and more of it -- these archipelagos included..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You have mis-imagined it. I don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You have mis-imagined it. I don't have the power to convey to you the effect and geometry of the images that depict our world from below low orbit. It's..."

fields.Title: You: ""A dark grey corona?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A dark grey corona?"

fields.Title: You: ""How come?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How come?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Imagine a grey coronal mist, cold..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Imagine a grey coronal mist, cold vapour, marked by spores of an opportunistic microorganism -- a mould that's adapted to grow at the edge of the unrest. It's..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The logical positivists say -- the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The logical positivists say -- the dialectical materialists argue."

fields.Title: You: ""Slipping how? To our detriment or...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Slipping how? To our detriment or..."

fields.Title: You: ""I'll handle it. It's under control.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll handle it. It's under control."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Your colleague, Lieutenant Kitsura..."
