fields.Dialogue Text: "Your colleague, Lieutenant Kitsuragi, is competent. I checked up on him. And you have me -- I will try to assist you in any way I can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We are where we are. I have no tru..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We are where we are. I have no truer answer to give, unfortunately." She watches you closely as you scan the horizon.

fields.Title: You: ""It's related to that *medical epis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's related to that *medical episode* -- I have trouble remembering even the most basic terms of reality."

fields.Title: You: ""Please don't make me say it again.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please don't make me say it again."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually... that is not why I need..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually... that is not why I need a low-down."

fields.Title: Perception: "He gives you a slight nudge on your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He gives you a slight nudge on your side, apparently enjoying himself.

fields.Title: You: ""Who lived in them?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who lived in them?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Caillou." She looks to the waters...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Caillou." She looks to the waters. "Imagine a pebble, a smoothed over pebble amidst a great blue sea. Mis-shapen, cracked. The cracks are the River Esperance. We're in the delta of this river, on the sixth branch -- the Martinaise distributary."
fields.Alternate1: "Caillou, as you already know." She looks to the waters. "Imagine a pebble, a smoothed over pebble amidst a great blue sea. Mis-shapen, cracked. The cracks are the River Esperance. We're in the delta of this river, on the sixth branch -- the Martinaise distributary."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, I was *slumming* it with some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I was *slumming* it with some girlfriends of mine. We had boats and..." She smiles. "Don't hold it against me -- the boys certainly did not."

fields.Title: You: "Let it go."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it go.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, let's..." She settles down --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, let's..." She settles down -- still a quivering smile on her face.

fields.Title: You: ""You're disco?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're disco?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I can't be one hundred percent sur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't be one hundred percent sure, but I believe he died due to complications from venereal disease."

fields.Title: You: ""No time for more questions now --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No time for more questions now -- the art world calls. A performative experiment. You wouldn't understand." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""I don't understand -- what's so vi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't understand -- what's so vile about that?"

fields.Title: You: ""Vile Deuill." (Shake your head slo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Vile Deuill." (Shake your head slowly.)

fields.Title: You: ""This world does not deserve a term..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This world does not deserve a term of endearment."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It *must* be. This is the greatest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It *must* be. This is the greatest and kindest arrangement the atoms had in them.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""See? Everyone finds something wort..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "See? Everyone finds something worth holding onto in the world -- however wasted its opportunities."

fields.Title: Shivers: "There is no recognition. Only the i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no recognition. Only the immensity of the sea, and the cold radiating from it.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Your stomach grumbles approvingly....."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your stomach grumbles approvingly... the reality rhizome is opening up before your very eyes.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know, I just feel it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know, I just feel it."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, but... what *is* it? A defin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, but... what *is* it? A definition..."

fields.Title: You: ""So I'm basically a thrall to forei..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I'm basically a thrall to foreign interests?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." The lieutenant returns. "He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." The lieutenant returns. "He has not passed out from it. Perhaps I worried for nothing... Are we still on the reality low-down -- or should we do actual policework now?"

fields.Title: You: ""*When* was Revachol built?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*When* was Revachol built?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We are standing on a fertile, self..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We are standing on a fertile, self-sufficient island able to sustain up to 200 million people; in the middle of the Insulindic ocean -- the world's connective tissue..." She smiles. "It's where the money is."

fields.Title: You: ""Is it... here?" (Look around.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is it... here?" (Look around.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Pale when it's particular -- this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pale when it's particular -- this territory of pale -- *the* pale when it's pale in its entirety. Once you've seen it..." She tosses her head. "Language balks at the difference."

fields.Title: You: ""Aerostatic craft?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Aerostatic craft?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""What do you think, detective?" She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think, detective?" She looks you in the eye.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know how you've all surviv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know how you've all survived with it -- it's a huge accomplishment."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""So, permit me to conclude with thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, permit me to conclude with this -- *who* you are -- to me -- is the police. The only legitimate law enforcement authority in Revachol."

fields.Title: You: ""But I want to know everything now.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But I want to know everything now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "It's better not to eat al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods. "It's better not to eat all your candy at once."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Except the ones who are philosophe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Except the ones who are philosophers."

fields.Title: Composure: "Trying to gauge by your expression..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Trying to gauge by your expression and demeanour whether you're joking. She concludes you're not.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." The lieutenant takes a step..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." The lieutenant takes a step closer to you. "Why don't you tell Mrs. Messier what you told me, hmh?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A sort of... spiritual quest? Some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A sort of... spiritual quest? Something of ancient Iilmaraan origin?" There's more than a trace of irony in her voice.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A bird?" She tilts her head. "A *s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A bird?" She tilts her head. "A *sphenicid* -- a flightless bird of the polar regions?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""...or two." She looks around."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...or two." She looks around.

fields.Title: You: ""No, no, I meant something basic ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no, I meant something basic about reality."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Be my guest." She takes a sip from..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""We *are*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We *are*."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, it's probably from surgery the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, it's probably from surgery then."

fields.Title: Drama: "Yes! And *lie* about it too! To her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes! And *lie* about it too! To her!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am an ultra.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am an ultra."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's a pity," she bows. "I hope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a pity," she bows. "I hope we can remain collegial despite my monstrousness. The ultras didn't have anything against the king *or* the Commune, you see. It was just business."
fields.Alternate1: "That's a pity," she bows. "I hope we can remain collegial despite the fact that I'm a high priestess of capital. Don't take it personally -- it was only business, as they say."
fields.Alternate2: "That's a pity," she bows. "I hope we can remain collegial despite my affection for regicide and multiculturalism. We didn't *mean* to kill the king, I assure you."
fields.Alternate3: "That's a pity," she bows. "I do hope we can remain collegial despite it all. Tell me, when you look in the mirror, do you not see a monster staring back at you?"
fields.Alternate4: "That's a pity," she bows. "I hope we can remain collegial despite it. Remember, we were partners, whether you like to admit it or not. There's blood on many hands, I assure you."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I do hope so," she bows. "I hope w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do hope so," she bows. "I hope we are able to remain collegial despite my monstrousness. The ultras didn't have anything against the king *or* the Commune, you see. It was just business."
fields.Alternate1: "I hope you do. I hope we are able to continue as friends despite my scales and my need to infiltrate and betray your precious Revolution."
fields.Alternate2: "I do hope so," she bows. "I hope we can remain collegial despite my affection for regicide and multiculturalism. We didn't *mean* to kill the king, I assure you."
fields.Alternate3: "I do hope so," she bows. "I do hope we're able to remain collegial despite it all. Tell me, when you look in the mirror, do you not see a monster staring back at you?"
fields.Alternate4: "I do hope so," she bows. "I hope we are able to remain collegial despite it. Remember, we were partners, whether you like to admit it or not. There's blood on many hands, I assure you."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't care.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't care."

fields.Title: You: ""You're a patriot?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're a patriot?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A term of hatred that originates,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A term of hatred that originates, like many such things, with the Mesque petrofascists."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Don't worry, I'll never get around..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry, I'll never get around to it -- the information you pass to me will remain confidential," She waves you off: "Let's get back to reality, shall we?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We've been through this -- ask som..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've been through this -- ask something else or let's return to work."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A collection of tall ghosts behind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A collection of tall ghosts behind the water vapour, light reflecting off their glass windows.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are they now?" The lieutenant cock..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are they now?" The lieutenant cocks one eyebrow.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In the Dolorian century, 380 years..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In the Dolorian century, 380 years ago."

fields.Title: You: ""The pale can damage the mind?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The pale can damage the mind?"

fields.Title: You: ""How?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Hybrid airships, detective. Conven..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hybrid airships, detective. Conventional rotors or jet engines no longer add velocity after the point of reference for motion is suspended -- once you've crossed from near pale to far pale..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Then tell me -- what do you *think..."]
Joyce Messier: ""Of course, pardon my prying -- ano..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, pardon my prying -- another basic term perhaps, or..." She stands attentively.

fields.Title: You: ""It's terrifying.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's terrifying."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Why should we just leave and leave..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why should we just leave and leave -- and the world get left behind?

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Are you sure you're sure? Your col..."]
Joyce Messier: ""No, but... please. A *little* cont..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, but... please. A *little* context. We're not in such a hurry."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""We always do.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We always do."

fields.Title: Drama: "Yes, reality is your side-case."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, reality is your side-case.

fields.Title: You: ""And aren't all detectives philosop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And aren't all detectives philosophers?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Naturally," he nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Naturally," he nods.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A deep synthesis," she nods. "I'll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A deep synthesis," she nods. "I'll assist you however I can then. Go ahead. Ask."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Martinaise is a district of Revach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Martinaise is a district of Revachol." She looks around, her green raincoat flapping in the wind. "A very small district tucked away near the Industrial Harbour. North of the 8/81 and Jamrock."

fields.Title: You: "No -- or intellectual vanity will b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No -- or intellectual vanity will be *my* undoing!

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Ah, yes. There's something very sa..."]
Joyce Messier: ""I can't. That's how simple it is...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't. That's how simple it is. One may dye their hair green and wear their grandma's coat all they want. Capital has the ability to subsume all critiques into itself. Even those who would *critique* capital end up *reinforcing* it instead..."

fields.Title: You: ""I think *I* may be part of an infr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think *I* may be part of an infraculture."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing *infra* about disco, baby.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing *infra* about disco, baby."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes. That means: not de jure. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. That means: not de jure. The RCM acts in what is poetically called the *twilight of international law*; both at the behest of the Coalition Government -- and to its chagrin."

fields.Title: You: ""Too late for what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Too late for what?"

fields.Title: Volition: "Wait, wait, this *reality thing* is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, wait, this *reality thing* is the only game in town. It's probably in your interest not to blow it.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Unimportant, as I said. The minera..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unimportant, as I said. The mineral rights were all distributed during the Revolution -- as were the bullets to the heads."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes," she nods slowly. "I am the n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes," she nods slowly. "I am the nether creature of the forbidden swamp. I pushed the king under a *shitwagon* and betrayed the Revolution. My kind surrendered the nation to financial colonists..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, I suppose I am. But I wouldn'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I suppose I am. But I wouldn't be a patriot anywhere but here."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We used to think it was a sphere,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We used to think it was a sphere, but that is beginning to look less and less likely by the day. You wouldn't know it from the tabloids, but the ORG nations have been launching weather balloons into the lower ionosphere since the Thirties."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Half Light: "A cold fear seeps into you."
fields.Dialogue Text: A cold fear seeps into you.

fields.Title: Authority: "His voice is low, but firm. All she..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His voice is low, but firm. All she can say is...

fields.Title: You: ""Okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay then."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He truly, truly doesn't want you to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He truly, truly doesn't want you to know.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""An oceanic isola. It comprises mos..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An oceanic isola. It comprises mostly of water. Mundi is the largest, Katla the coldest, Insulinde the bluest. What can I say..." She stops. "Each is perishing and dear."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The *Great* kind.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The *Great* kind."

fields.Title: You: ""And why will it *resolve* History?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And why will it *resolve* History?" (Continue.)

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You can't get a venereal disease f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You can't get a venereal disease from that, can you?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The doubt is fully formed in your h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The doubt is fully formed in your head -- the alien feeling persists -- you just can't *word* the question yet. You have to complete the *Jamais Vu* thought first.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""The further into pale you travel,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The further into pale you travel, the steeper the degree of suspension. Right down to the mathematical -- *numbers* stop working. No one has yet passed the number barrier. It may be impossible."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "A squall of birds, hardware operati..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A squall of birds, hardware operating in the harbour. Firm, self-evident.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She's looking out toward the sea, w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She's looking out toward the sea, what at, it's hard to say.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In essence, we throw them in and t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In essence, we throw them in and they come out the other end -- if we throw them precisely."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""This isn't really an inquiry, is i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This isn't really an inquiry, is it? You can't remember a single thing -- this is the first time you're hearing about any of this."

fields.Title: You: ""I'd like to discuss something else..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'd like to discuss something else, if you don't mind."

fields.Title: You: ""It will end all life.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It will end all life."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine." He steps away with his note..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine." He steps away with his notes.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." The lieutenant returns. "Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." The lieutenant returns. "You have not passed out from it. Perhaps I worried for nothing... Are we still on the reality low-down -- or should we do actual policework now?"

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Yes, and perform auto-erotic asphyx..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, and perform auto-erotic asphyxiation on yourself with your funny neck tie. Out in the open somewhere!

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""And if those authorities drink so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And if those authorities drink so hard they need help recalling the basic terms of reality -- well, I am here to help." She bows and smiles.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "An *experimental* side-case."
fields.Dialogue Text: An *experimental* side-case.

fields.Title: You: ""I am conducting a personal investi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am conducting a personal investigation into the world I find myself in."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Except the ones who are detectives.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Except the ones who are detectives."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ah, yes -- the *episode*. Sounds l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes -- the *episode*. Sounds like an acute case of encephalopathy now that I think of it..." She puts down her thermal cup and looks at you.

fields.Title: You: ""I meant what is this *place* here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I meant what is this *place* here?"

fields.Title: You: ""So, we're pretty much at the centr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, we're pretty much at the centre of the world?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "It is clear this *pebble* is of eno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is clear this *pebble* is of enormous value to her...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We may be here awhile, then." She..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We may be here awhile, then." She takes a long sip to clear her throat. "Ask away, officer -- I'll help however I can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Ha!" She smiles. "Aren't we all?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha!" She smiles. "Aren't we all?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "...and to Humanity at large."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...and to Humanity at large.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Be my guest." She takes a sip from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Be my guest." She takes a sip from her thermal cup.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It stands for Revachol Citizens Mi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It stands for Revachol Citizens Militia."

fields.Title: You: ""Are we?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are we?"

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you, ma'am.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, ma'am."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""For the *Big Time*." Her eyes ligh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For the *Big Time*." Her eyes light up. There's a flash of teeth.

fields.Title: You: ""Got it. Let me ask something else.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Got it. Let me ask something else."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Hmh..." She hums."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh..." She hums.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I am the vilest of the vile," she..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am the vilest of the vile," she says with a sudden flash of teeth. "A traitor, a devourer of nations and infants..."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Forgive her."
fields.Dialogue Text: Forgive her.

fields.Title: You: ""*And perswades them to addict them..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*And perswades them to addict themselues to his seruice...*"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""In any case, I'm glad we can remai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In any case, I'm glad we can remain collegial despite my scaly bulk. And my perverse need to infiltrate and betray both Kingdom *and* Revolution."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""When the dust settled, the liberal..."]
You: ""Well, if you say it's disco...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, if you say it's disco..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Elysium.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Elysium."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""But -- this is one of the great qu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But -- this is one of the great questions of our time. Maybe when they get the complete set together it will jolt us out of our rut -- bring us together. However naive it may sound."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "You could be wrong -- but from here..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could be wrong -- but from here it appears as if she's running the brush *across* her throat, in a sawing motion.

fields.Title: Empathy: "There is regret in her voice -- for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is regret in her voice -- for all the countless things she never had time to do with her money.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Empathy: "She does not seem convinced that yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She does not seem convinced that you'll be fine. If anything, she is realizing this whole reality low-down is less *philosophical* than you've led on.

fields.Title: You: ""So I'm basically a lackey of capit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I'm basically a lackey of capital?"

fields.Title: You: ""Are you sure he didn't die of auto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure he didn't die of auto-erotic asphyxiation?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ma'am." He turns to her again. "Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ma'am." He turns to her again. "This philosophical police detective is very *sensitive* and *impressionable* because of his recent medical episode."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "As your gaze instinctively turns no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As your gaze instinctively turns north, a small black pit opens up in your stomach.

fields.Title: You: ""That was fucking insane. Kim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was fucking insane. Kim."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Actually, yes. The thought did cro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, yes. The thought did cross my mind when Mademoiselle Lilienne earlier told me about the fresh produce these women sell to restaurants on the Delta."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Aren't all..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Aren't all...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""But then, I'm no doctor." She take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But then, I'm no doctor." She takes a long sip of tea. "Ask away, officer -- I'll help however I can."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Nothing wrong with ancient ways,"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing wrong with ancient ways," she says. "Our *modern* ones aren't necessarily better. Ask away, officer -- I'll help however I can."

fields.Title: You: ""What are *you*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are *you*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""This one used to be eight to ten s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This one used to be eight to ten stories tall -- a real high rise by the standards of the last century. Built to mirror the skyscrapers across the bay in the Delta. That was before the war, of course."

fields.Title: You: ""Mhm. And what is *Martinaise*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm. And what is *Martinaise*?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I'm not a good ambassador. I've on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not a good ambassador. I've only been here once before, as a teenager. Not a lot has changed..." She closes her eyes. "There are ruins, a terminal, fishing boats, reeds. Boys with boxy shoulders."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A casual term of endearment popula..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A casual term of endearment popular among the 50+ crowd. It's a disco holdover, pay it no heed."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I would be happy to. What is a pre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would be happy to. What is a preposterously expensive education for if not sharing."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "She lets out an unrestrained laugh,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She lets out an unrestrained laugh, the crows feet stretching onto her cheeks...

fields.Title: You: ""Sounds fun. I can't remember a sin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds fun. I can't remember a single thing."

fields.Title: You: ""Champagne? That doesn't sound like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Champagne? That doesn't sound like anything *I'd* be into. I'm straight edge."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""*All* of them.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*All* of them."

fields.Title: You: ""Good. And what is the Revachol Cit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. And what is the Revachol Citizens Militia?"

fields.Title: You: ""You said *de facto*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You said *de facto*?"

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "The smile of a predator. No doubt w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The smile of a predator. No doubt what she's got in mind.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There may be a way to get her speak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There may be a way to get her speaking about herself -- at some later juncture.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""We surrendered the nation to finan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We surrendered the nation to financial colonists. No sane person identifies as an *ultra* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks you in the eye. "Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- are you repulsed?"
fields.Alternate1: "We surrendered the nation to the financier pirates. No sane person identifies as an *ultraliberal* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks you in the eye. "You're a man of the left, a true communard. Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- are you repulsed?"
fields.Alternate2: "We surrendered the nation to the financier pirates, no sane person identifies as an *ultraliberal* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks you in the eye. "You've got Revachol in your blood, a real nationalist. Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- are you repulsed?"
fields.Alternate3: "We surrendered the nation to financier pirates, no sane person identifies as *ultraliberal* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks into your eye. "I can see we're not so different, you know. Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- do you find me frightening?"
fields.Alternate4: "I can see you thought I'd gone extinct. No sane person identifies as an *ultraliberal* anymore. Not in broad daylight." She looks you in the eye. "You're a centrist at heart, a real moralist. Tell me -- now that I've *uncoiled* myself -- do you find me frightening?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You *feel* that she won't like the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You *feel* that she won't like the answer -- just as it's leaving your lips. Even more -- it will hurt her.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Not in this case, no. That sounds..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not in this case, no. That sounds more like something the Mesque petrofascists might say..." Her gaze wanders.

fields.Title: You: ""What are animals then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are animals then?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""See? Everyone finds something wort..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "See? Everyone finds something worth holding onto in this world -- however wasted its opportunities."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They say there is a rarefied envel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They say there is a rarefied envelope of matter surrounding the darkened disc of our planet. That is, if we are still living on a planet. Or, to speak more plainly, imagine vast swathes of land disrupted by nothingness."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You seem to be spooked. Please don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You seem to be spooked. Please don't be." Her voice becomes homely, calm. She lets a moment pass.

fields.Title: Lilienne, the Net Picker: "You both turn to consider the young..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You both turn to consider the young woman. She's hunched over a net, methodically picking out ribbons of plastic...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Let's. I am, after all, bourgeois..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's. I am, after all, bourgeois and female -- hardly the perfect ambassador for the world."

fields.Title: Shivers: "The cold seeps into you. The air is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cold seeps into you. The air is heavy with 80% humidity.

fields.Title: You: ""Why here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why here?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Achromatic, odourless, featureless..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Achromatic, odourless, featureless. The pale is the enemy of matter and life. It is not *like* any other -- or *any* thing in the world. It is the transition state of being into nothingness."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Who says and who argues?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who says and who argues?

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Then they don't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then they don't."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""I suggest you do the same.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suggest you do the same."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, sweet reality," she stomps he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, sweet reality," she stomps her foot. "But before we do, tell me detective..."

fields.Title: Drama: "There is no way in *any* reality th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no way in *any* reality that she's still buying your *shtick*. Better drop it.

fields.Title: You: ""A powerful anti-communist force. P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A powerful anti-communist force. Perhaps *too* powerful... but still. They have it coming."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. I'm in serious trouble here.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I'm in serious trouble here."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "This is not going to happen with th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not going to happen with the lieutenant present -- unless you can convince him to step aside.

fields.Title: You: ""Some more reality lowdown before w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Some more reality lowdown before we go."

fields.Title: You: ""What was the RCM again?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was the RCM again?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Absolutely -- my commitment here i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolutely -- my commitment here is long term."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't be fazed, madam. He function..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't be fazed, madam. He functions perfectly well. He only needs a... *lowdown* on all of reality."

fields.Title: You: ""Tell me more about Martinaise.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell me more about Martinaise."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Known to the early Revacholians as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Known to the early Revacholians as *les Immensités Bleues* -- The Blue Immensities.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""A smart boy getting smarter, one b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A smart boy getting smarter, one basic term of reality at a time..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: "Her eyes go round with surprise. "A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Her eyes go round with surprise. "And what would *that* be?"

fields.Title: You: ""What causes encephalopathy?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What causes encephalopathy?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "In her green eyes you see a mixture..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In her green eyes you see a mixture of truth and self-satire. Decades of guilt *and* pride.

fields.Title: You: "(Nod.) "Devil Woman.""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Nod.) "Devil Woman."

fields.Title: Shivers: "While a gentle wind sweeps the stre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: While a gentle wind sweeps the streets in the rebuilt East, light drizzle washing it clean, lights go up and motor carriages circulate the tracts...

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""It does. There are those who would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It does. There are those who would call it *Hell*..."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh my god, wait -- what the hell a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh my god, wait -- what the hell are you telling me?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Mundi, Seol, Samara, Iilmaraa, Gra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mundi, Seol, Samara, Iilmaraa, Graad, Katla, and this -- Insulinde."

fields.Title: You: ""And Insulinde is...?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And Insulinde is...?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "The price of a 1.5 litre bottle of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The price of a 1.5 litre bottle of Commodore Red? The first line of the Firefighter's Code? Square root of three? I don't know what you mean by *something close to you*. Ask a normal question.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "To his left, his partner Émile Moll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To his left, his partner Émile Mollins whispers: "You heard what happened to Tequila Sunset? In Martinaise?"

fields.Title: You: ""What are its physical qualities?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are its physical qualities?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""An uproar of matter, darling, *ris..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An uproar of matter, darling, *rising* into the pale. Rolling. Evaporating even, a great vision. The area of transition between the world and the pale is called *porch collapse*."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""They call it *the blend-over of th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They call it *the blend-over of the self*. The pale does not only suspend the laws of physics, but also the laws of psychology, maybe History, even... The human mind becomes over-radiated by past."

fields.Title: You: "Let it go."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it go.

fields.Title: You: ""No. Nothing like that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. Nothing like that."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm worried. I have to say, it doe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm worried. I have to say, it doesn't sound very *liberal* to me."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Your ailing constitution, sweaty fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your ailing constitution, sweaty forehead, the beads there and your heavy breathing.

fields.Title: You: ""Hah -- and what *is* this Revoluti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hah -- and what *is* this Revolution I keep hearing about?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "You will have to deal with it too,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You will have to deal with it too, the lieutenant thinks. This is why I didn't want you to know.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes, lieutenant. Permit me to conc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, lieutenant. Permit me to conclude with this -- *who* you are -- to me -- is the police. The only legitimate law enforcement authority in Revachol."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""...and if the law officials of our..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...and if the law officials of our nation need help with the basic terms of reality -- well, then I am here to help." She bows.

fields.Title: You: ""None of that foreign wisdom. I onl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "None of that foreign wisdom. I only seek deep, ancient PATRIOTIC truths."

fields.Title: You: ""Forget the past, my quest concerns..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forget the past, my quest concerns the coming apocalypse."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually -- now is not a good time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually -- now is not a good time for a reality low-down. Maybe later."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Joyce Messier: ""Of course. The situation is precar..."]
You: ""What is this?" (Spread your hands...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is this?" (Spread your hands.)

fields.Title: You: ""Are we near the ocean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are we near the ocean?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But please -- do continue this rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But please -- do continue this reality-exploration. I was just remarking."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Maximum brio, officer.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maximum brio, officer."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: ""What's the Big Time?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the Big Time?"

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""You *may* have mis-imagined it. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You *may* have mis-imagined it. I don't have the power to convey to you the effect and geometry of the images that depict our world from below low orbit. It's..."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""That's looking less and less likel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's looking less and less likely, detective. You wouldn't know it from the tabloids, but the ORG nations have been launching weather balloons into the lower ionosphere since the Thirties."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Doubtless I'll be off some place,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Doubtless I'll be off some place, keeping social classes from each other's throats..." There's a pause. "Let's go back to the basics of reality, shall we?"

fields.Title: You: ""The best of all possible worlds.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The best of all possible worlds."

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Yes!" She claps her hands for warm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes!" She claps her hands for warmth.

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Okay." She concedes. "The pale is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." She concedes. "The pale is the most dominant geological feature of the world, detective -- the separative tissue between the isolas. It is the interisolary mass."

fields.Title: You: ""Where *are* we?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where *are* we?"

fields.Title: Joyce Messier: ""Was there something else you wante..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was there something else you wanted to know? I remember something about a low-down..."
